member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO
member.summary: The WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO structure is used when calling to verify a member of a Microsoft catalog.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.cbStruct
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.pcwszCatalogFilePath
member.summary: The full path and file name of the catalog file that contains the member to be verified.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.pcwszMemberTag
member.summary: Tag of a member file to be verified.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.pcwszMemberFilePath
member.summary: The full path and file name of the catalog member file to be verified.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.hMemberFile
member.summary: Optional. Handle of the open catalog member file to be verified. The handle must be to a file with at least read permissions.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.pbCalculatedFileHash
member.summary: Optional. The calculated hash of the file that contains the file to be verified.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.cbCalculatedFileHash
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the value passed in the pbCalculatedFileHash member. cbCalculatedFileHash is used only if the calculated hash is being passed.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.pcCatalogContext
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that represents a catalog context to be used instead of a catalog file.

member.name: WINTRUST_CATALOG_INFO.hCatAdmin
member.summary: Handle to the catalog administrator context that was used when calculating the hash of the file. This value can be zero only for a SHA1 file hash.Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012: Support for this member begins.
